    • addCity

      @GetMapping("/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addCity(@RequestParam("cities") String[] cities)
      This method let users to add cities to a personal city list
      Parameters:
      cities - list of cities name
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity status of excecution and, if occurred, an error message in JSON format

    • currentWeather

      @GetMapping("/current") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> currentWeather(@RequestParam("cities") String[] cities)
      Method used to get current weather, it returns a JSONOnject with main weather informations
      Parameters:
      cities - list of cities for which wheather is required
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity response data in Json format, it can also return an INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR HttpStatus if exceptions occurred

    • hourlyWeather

      @GetMapping("/hourly") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> hourlyWeather(@RequestParam("cities") String[] cities)
      Method used to get hourly weather, it returns a JSONArray with main weather informations.

      Hourly means we return a list of 24 weather from now to 24 hours forward

      Parameters:
      cities - list of cities for which wheather is required
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity response data in Json format, it can also return an INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR HttpStatus if exceptions occurred

    • dailyWeather

      @GetMapping("/daily") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> dailyWeather(@RequestParam("cities") String[] cities)
      Method used to get daily weather, it returns a JSONOnject with main weather informations

      Daily means we return a list of 7 weather for each day, from today to 7 days forward

      Parameters:
      cities - list of cities for which wheather is required
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity response data in Json format, it can also return an INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR HttpStatus if exceptions occurred

    • morningDayEveNightWeather

      @GetMapping("/dayslot") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> morningDayEveNightWeather(@RequestParam("cities") String[] cities)
      Method used to get daily weather, it returns a JSONOnject with main weather informations

      Daily means we return a list of 4 weather, one for each today's dayslot (night, morning, afternoon and evening), so that route provied a summary of today's weather informations grouped by dayslot

      Parameters:
      cities - list of cities for which wheather is required
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity response data in Json format, it can also return an INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR HttpStatus if exceptions occurred

    • deleteCity

      @GetMapping("/remove") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteCity(@RequestParam("cities") String[] cities)
      This method let users to remove cities from the personal city list
      Parameters:
      cities - list of cities name
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity status of excecution and, if occurred, an error message in JSON format
